resources.string: Allows this application to read your Google Mail.
Allows this application to modify your Google Mail, including sending and deleting mail.
Allows this application to send Google Mail messages without opening the Google Mail application.
To use Google Mail you need a Google Account.
Google Mail is built on the idea that email can be more intuitive, efficient, and useful. And maybe even fun.
Google Mail sync for this account is %s
The account %s is not a valid Google Mail account.
